chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
instr: Set
data: Type
one_step: instr -> state -> state -> Prop
sss_fun: forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2
sss_dec: forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2}
P: subcode.code instr
Q: code
st: state

Goal:
P <sc Q -> Q // st ↓ -> P // st ↓

Premises:
Notation state := (nat * data)%type
subcode : subcode.code ?X -> nat * list ?X -> Prop where ?X : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
Notation code := (nat * list instr)%type
Tauto.N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type] ?TX : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]

Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type] ?TX : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type] ?TX : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
ssrbool.is_left : {?A} + {?B} -> bool where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Prop] ?B : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Prop]
code_start : subcode.code ?X -> nat where ?X : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
code_end : subcode.code ?X -> nat where ?X : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
VarMap.Empty : VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
in_code : nat -> subcode.code ?X -> Prop where ?X : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
out_code : nat -> subcode.code ?X -> Prop where ?X : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
EnvRing.PEX : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
VarMap.Elt : ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
EnvRing.PEc : ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
EnvRing.PEadd : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
EnvRing.PEsub : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr Q : code st : state |- Type]
subcode_sss_terminates_instr : forall (P : code) (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> P // st2 ↓ -> P // st1 ↓
subcode_sss_step_inv_1 : forall (P : code) (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> P // st1 :1> st2 -> st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2
subcode_sss_compute_instr : forall (P : code) (i : instr) (st1 st2 st3 : state), st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> P // st2 -> > st3 -> P // st1 -> > st3
subcode_sss_steps_stop : forall (P : code) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 : state), (forall st : state, ~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st) -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> P//st1-[k] -> st2 -> k = 0 /\ st1 = st2
in_sss_step : forall (k : nat) (l : list instr) (i : instr) (r : list instr) (st1 st2 : state), fst st1 = k + length l -> st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 -> (k, l ++ i :: r) // st1 :1> st2
subcode_sss_steps_inv_1 : forall (P : code) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : state), st1 <> st3 -> st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> P//st1-[k] -> st3 -> exists k' : nat, k = S k' /\ P//st2-[k'] -> st3
sss_step_fun : forall (P : code) (s t1 t2 : state), P // s :1> t1 -> P // s :1> t2 -> t1 = t2
sss_step = fun (P : code) (st1 st2 : state) => exists (k : nat) (l : list instr) (i : instr) (r : list instr) (d : data), P = (k, l ++ i :: r) /\ st1 = (k + length l, d) /\ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 : code -> state -> state -> Prop
sss_stall = fun (ii : instr) (st : state) => forall st' : state, ~ st ⟬ ii ⦒ st' : instr -> state -> Prop
sss_terminates_ind : forall (P : code) (R : state -> Prop), (forall st : state, out_code (fst st) P -> R st) -> (forall st1 : state, (forall (Q : subcode.code instr) (st2 : state), Q <sc P -> Q // st1 -+> st2 -> P // st2 ↓ -> R st2) -> R st1) -> forall st : state, P // st ↓ -> R st
sss_step_subcode_inv : forall (P : code) (ii : instr) (st st' : state), (fst st, ii :: nil) <sc P -> P // st :1> st' -> st ⟬ ii ⦒ st'
subcode_sss_terminates_inv : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (Q : code) (st st1 : state), Q // st ↓ -> P <sc Q -> P // st ~~> st1 -> Q // st1 ↓
sss_compute_max_ind : forall (P : code) (R : state -> state -> Prop), (forall st : state, sss_step_stall P st -> R st st) -> (forall st1 st3 : state, (forall (Q : subcode.code instr) (st2 : state), Q <sc P -> Q // st1 -+> st2 -> P // st2 -]] st3 -> R st2 st3) -> R st1 st3) -> forall st1 st3 : state, P // st1 -]] st3 -> R st1 st3
sss_steps_fun : forall (P : code) (k : nat) (s t1 t2 : state), P//s-[k] -> t1 -> P//s-[k] -> t2 -> t1 = t2
subcode_sss_compute_trans : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (Q : code) (st1 st2 st3 : state), P <sc Q -> P // st1 -> > st2 -> Q // st2 -> > st3 -> Q // st1 -> > st3
sss_step_supcode : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (Q : code) (st st' : state), P <sc Q -> in_code (fst st) P -> Q // st :1> st' -> P // st :1> st'
subcode_sss_progress : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (Q : code) (st1 st2 : state), P <sc Q -> P // st1 -+> st2 -> Q // st1 -+> st2
subcode_sss_step : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (Q : code) (st1 st2 : state), P <sc Q -> P // st1 :1> st2 -> Q // st1 :1> st2
subcode_sss_compute : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (Q : code) (st1 st2 : state), P <sc Q -> P // st1 -> > st2 -> Q // st1 -> > st2
subcode_sss_step_inv : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (Q : code) (st1 st2 : state), P <sc Q -> in_code (fst st1) P -> Q // st1 :1> st2 -> P // st1 :1> st2
subcode_in_code : forall (X : Type) (P : subcode.code X) (Q : nat * list X) (i : nat), P <sc Q -> in_code i P -> in_code i Q

``` 
intros.
intros H1 H2.
unfold subcode.code, subcode.subcode in H1.
unfold subcode.code in *.
unfold subcode.subcode in H1.
unfold subcode.subcode in H1.
destruct H1.
intros H3.
apply (subcode_sss_step_inv _ _ _ _ H H3).
apply (subcode_sss_compute _ _ _ _ H H2).
```

original: intros. intros H1 H2. unfold subcode.code, subcode.subcode in H1. unfold subcode.code in *. unfold subcode.subcode in H1. unfold subcode.subcode in H1. destruct H1. intros H3. apply (subcode_sss_step_inv _ _ _ _ H H3). apply (subcode_sss_compute _ _ _ _ H H2).
